customer.headline:
A Health Menu Tailored for You,
Makeat

customerMainContentList.label: For Customer
customerMainContentList.headline: Ultra-personalized Custom Food Service
customerMainContentList.desc: A tailored health management diet service where menus are generated based on individual health information.

contents.headline: Anytime, Anywhere
contents.text: Access our services seamlessly both online and offline through our mobile app.

contents.headline: Healthy Life, Healthy Diet
contents.text: Indulge in a healthy lifestyle with personalized, health-focused meals designed just for you.

contents.headline: Diverse and Delicious Meals
contents.text: Healthy eating can be delicious too! Create tasty and diverse meals with fresh ingredients through our Makeat service.

contents.headline: The New Concept of Customized Food
contents.text: Experience a fresh approach to personalized food with AI suggesting new menus anytime, considering both your health and preferences.

contents.headline: Personalized Meals for Me
contents.text: Discover menus created based on your health information. Enjoy menus specially crafted for you, not chosen from existing ones.

contents.headline: Generative Food Service
contents.text: Experience menus created specifically for your healthy meals, rather than choosing from existing ones. A personalized food service that goes beyond frozen food limitations!

contents.headline: Infinite Menu Combinations
contents.text: Leave behind dull diets and discover constantly new personalized menus. Experience infinite choices with the diversity of block combinations.

contents.headline: Reasonable Prices Anywhere
contents.text: Behind the personalized block combinations is a block that realizes cost savings through mass production. This allows you to enjoy delicious food at reasonable prices!
